Title: The health facilities of New China
Designer: Chinese National Science Popularization Association (中华全国科学技术普及协会)
Publisher: Renmin meishu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: A five-poster series from 1952.The photographs show medics inoculating workers at the Huai RIver project; inspecting a village; Soviet medics treating patients; a Red Cross worker giving a talk at the Huai River project; blood research; inspecting BCG vaccines on school children.
